hours: Monday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Thursday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Saturday: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM
materials: Aluminum Cans; Carpet; Ceiling Tiles; Ceramic Tiles; Construction Materials (Reuse); Gift Bags; Household Goods; Linoleum; Ornaments; Porcelain; Reusable Appliance Donation; Roofing Materials; Windows; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: The ReStore raises funds by selling merchandise and, after expenses, uses all profits to build more homes.  Habitat also provides families an opportunity to buy building materials that they may not otherwise be able to afford. This will help raise the standards of housing. By recycling goods that would have been sent to a landfill, the ReStore also helps reduce waste disposal costs. If you have materials to donate, please call for more information or to arrange for the pick-up of materials. The Habitat ReStore takes most materials and the staff will be glad to talk with you.

name: Batteries Plus Bulbs
materials: Compact Fluorescent Lights; Batteries (Rechargeable); Alkaline/Single-Use Batteries; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Some fees for battery recycling may apply. Please contact your Local store for details.

Batteries Plus lead by example by recycling the majority of the batteries we sell. Not only do we recycle to protect our environment, we support retail and business customers alike by keeping them in full compliance with federal, state, municipal, EPA and DOT regulations governing the disposal and recycling of spent batteries and select electronics.
